item.source: Wtf is wrong with the forms

item.title: Wtf is wrong with the forms
item.dc:creator: @Chrisface Chrisface
item.description:
@Chrisface wrote:

Ony line 5 you have “Type : Tlabel;”

Type is a reserved word which is used similarly to declaring a new var so what sort of has hapened is you’ve done something like this:

var var :Tlabel;

Whenever text goes into bold it means that its a special reserved word in pascal and can’t be used as a variable so make it “ResourceType” or something. I tested it and it works. You will also need to change the options you set for it later.

program New;

var
  frmDesign : TForm;
  ResourceType : TLabel;
  lvl : TLabel;
  Edit1 : TEdit;
  skip : TCheckBox;
  Wait : TCheckBox;
  Edit3 : TEdit;
  Edit4 : TEdit;
  Edit5 : TEdit;
  Edit6 : TEdit;
  Edit7 : TEdit;
  Edit8 : TEdit;
  Edit9 : TEdit;
  Edit10 : TEdit;
  Edit11 : TEdit;
  Edit12 : TEdit;
  Edit13 : TEdit;
  Edit14 : TEdit;
  Edit15 : TEdit;
  Edit16 : TEdit;
  CheckBox1 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox2 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox3 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox4 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox5 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox6 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox7 : TCheckBox;
  Edit2 : TEdit;
  CheckBox8 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox9 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox10 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox11 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox12 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox13 : TCheckBox;
  CheckBox14 : TCheckBox;
  Auto : TButton;
  Cancel : TButton;
  Edit17 : TEdit;
  Edit18 : TEdit;
  Edit19 : TEdit;

procedure buttonclick(sender: TObject);
begin
  Writeln('YOU CANCELED, STUPID NOOB :D');
  frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.';
  frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;



procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 696;
frmDesign.Height := 480;
frmDesign.Caption := 'frmDesign';
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
ResourceType := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
ResourceType .Parent := frmDesign;
ResourceType .Left := 72;
ResourceType .Top := 115;
ResourceType .Width := 24;
ResourceType .Height := 13;
ResourceType .Caption := 'Type';
lvl := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
lvl.Parent := frmDesign;
lvl.Left := 236;
lvl.Top := 102;
lvl.Width := 10;
lvl.Height := 13;
lvl.Caption := 'lvl';
Edit1 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit1.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit1.Left := 68;
Edit1.Top := 137;
Edit1.Width := 55;
Edit1.Height := 21;
Edit1.TabOrder := 8;
Edit1.Text := 'METAL';
skip := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
skip.Parent := frmDesign;
skip.Left := 235;
skip.Top := 141;
skip.Width := 50;
skip.Height := 17;
skip.Caption := 'skip';
skip.TabOrder := 9;
Wait := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
Wait.Parent := frmDesign;
Wait.Left := 287;
Wait.Top := 141;
Wait.Width := 64;
Wait.Height := 17;
Wait.Caption := 'Wait';
Wait.TabOrder := 10;
Edit3 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit3.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit3.Left := 66;
Edit3.Top := 171;
Edit3.Width := 59;
Edit3.Height := 21;
Edit3.TabOrder := 11;
Edit3.Text := 'Crystal';
Edit4 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit4.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit4.Left := 67;
Edit4.Top := 207;
Edit4.Width := 56;
Edit4.Height := 21;
Edit4.TabOrder := 12;
Edit4.Text := 'Deutrem';
Edit5 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit5.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit5.Left := 65;
Edit5.Top := 243;
Edit5.Width := 63;
Edit5.Height := 21;
Edit5.TabOrder := 13;
Edit5.Text := 'power';
Edit6 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit6.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit6.Left := 65;
Edit6.Top := 276;
Edit6.Width := 64;
Edit6.Height := 21;
Edit6.TabOrder := 14;
Edit6.Text := 'robotics';
Edit7 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit7.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit7.Left := 66;

Edit7.Width := 58;
Edit7.Height := 21;
Edit7.TabOrder := 15;
Edit7.Text := 'research';
Edit8 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);

Edit8.Left := 69;

Edit8.Width := 57;
Edit8.Height := 21;
Edit8.TabOrder := 16;

Edit15.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit15.Left := 169;
Edit15.Top := 316;
Edit15.Width := 25;
Edit15.Height := 21;
Edit15.TabOrder := 23;
Edit15.Text := 'lvl';
Edit16 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit16.Parent := frmDesign;
Edit16.Left := 169;
Edit16.Top := 344;
Edit16.Width := 26;
Edit16.Height := 21;
Edit16.TabOrder := 24;
Edit16.Text := 'lvl';
CheckBox1 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
CheckBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox1.Left := 237;
CheckBox1.Top := 176;
CheckBox1.Width := 51;
CheckBox1.Height := 17;
CheckBox1.Caption := 'skip';
CheckBox1.TabOrder := 25;
CheckBox2 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
CheckBox2.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox2.Left := 291;

CheckBox2.Width := 97;
CheckBox2.Height := 17;
CheckBox2.Caption := 'Wait';
CheckBox2.TabOrder := 26;

CheckBox3.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox3.Left := 240;

CheckBox4.TabOrder := 28;
CheckBox5 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);

CheckBox5.Left := 242;

CheckBox5.Width := 97;
CheckBox5.Height := 17;
CheckBox5.Caption := 'skip';
CheckBox5.TabOrder := 29;
CheckBox6 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
CheckBox6.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox6.Left := 242;

CheckBox6.Width := 97;

CheckBox6.Caption := 'skip';
CheckBox6.TabOrder := 30;
CheckBox7 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
CheckBox7.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox7.Left := 244;

CheckBox7.Width := 97;
CheckBox7.Height := 17;
CheckBox7.Caption := 'skip';

Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;

Edit2.TabOrder := 32;

CheckBox8.Width := 97;
CheckBox8.Height := 17;
CheckBox8.Caption := 'skip';

CheckBox9.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox9.Left := 241;
CheckBox9.Top := 381;
CheckBox9.Width := 97;
CheckBox9.Height := 17;
CheckBox9.Caption := 'skip';
CheckBox9.TabOrder := 34;
CheckBox10 := TCheckBox.Create(frmDesign);
CheckBox10.Parent := frmDesign;
CheckBox10.Left := 302;
CheckBox10.Top := 253;
CheckBox10.Width := 97;
CheckBox10.Height := 17;
CheckBox10.Caption := 'Wait';
CheckBox10.TabOrder := 35;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
  frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;




begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
end.

Read full topic

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

  frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

var
  v: TVariantArray;
begin
  setarraylength(V, 0);
  ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;
